medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient was first seen in 1998 for bilateral blurry vision in the context of a migraine. By 2002, a discrete bilateral nasal step was noted on visual field examination despite stable ocular tension. In 2006, the patient experienced progressive binasal hemianopia, with normal visual acuity and ocular tension.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Known high blood pressure, smoking, familial hypertriglyceridemia, chronic pancreatitis with episodes of intravenous hyperalimentation.
